query:
SELECT 
  'goals' as source,
  g.campaignId,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM goals g
GROUP BY g.campaignId
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'campaign besta' as source,
  c.id as campaignId,
  1 as count
FROM campaigns c
WHERE c.slug = 'besta';
